title: Making Joy a Priority at Work
itunes:title: Making Joy a Priority at Work
description:
Alex Liu, Chairman and Managing Partner at Kearney, discusses building better cultures of joy and positivity in the workplace. He says joy connects people more powerfully than almost any other human experience.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
